t: Your Profile and Sensitive Products - Amazon Customer Service
s: Public activity or contributions associated with products classified as sensitive will be hidden from your public profile automatically. These products include certain personal care products, jewelry, intimate clothing, self-help, erotic media, and products used for personal protection.

t: What is the difference between brand safety and brand suitability?
